hero.title: A Safe Haven for Growing Minds
hero.subtitle: Our child-friendly spaces are designed to encourage exploration while providing a safe and secure environment for growth and development.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: Our mission is to create a nurturing and stimulating environment where children can explore, learn, and grow.

safety.title: Safety
safety.subtitle: Children's safety is our number one priority. Our staff is trained in first aid and CPR, and all employees must undergo a criminal background check.

parents.title: Parents
parents.subtitle: We know that parents have busy schedules, so we offer flexible hours and a variety of programs to meet their needs.

philosophy.title: PHILOSOPHY
philosophy.subtitle: We believe that with love and care every child can learn. That is why we provide all the elements for a strong foundation of success. We take pride in creating a healthy environment with wholesome activities. We purposely fill our time with active, fun-filled programs that engage the whole child's developing mind and body.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle1: At CDC Day Care, we’re proud to provide a caring and safe environment for your children. By following our mission, vision and values, we create a nurturing, stimulating and welcoming learning environment for all children.
about.subtitle2: En CDC Day Care, estamos orgullosos de brindar un ambiente seguro y afectuoso para sus hijos. Siguiendo nuestra misión, visión y valores, creamos un entorno de aprendizaje enriquecedor, estimulante y acogedor para todos los niños.
